name: Do-San
meaning: Do San is the pseudonym of the patriot Ahn Chang-Ho (1876-1938). The 24 movements represent his entire life which he devoted to furthering the education of Korea and its independence movement.

moves.title: Parallel Ready Stance
moves.description: Parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: High outer forearm side block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform high outer forearm side block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi

moves.title: Middle front punch
moves.description: Remain in left walking stance. Perform middle front punch.

moves.title: High outer forearm side block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees right to face 3 o'clock. Step into right walking stance. Perform high outer forearm side block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi

moves.title: Middle front punch
moves.description: Remain in right walking stance. Perform middle front punch.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Step into right L-stance. Perform middle knife-hand guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Walking stance thrust
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle straight fingertip thrust.

moves.title: Walking stance strike
moves.description: Turn left 360 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform high backfist side strike.

moves.title: Walking stance strike
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high backfist side strike.

moves.title: Walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 270 degrees left to face 3 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform high outer forearm side block.

moves.title: Walking stance punch
moves.description: Remain in left walking stance. Perform middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees right to face 3 o'clock. Step into right walking stance. Perform high outer forearm side block.

moves.title: Walking stance punch
moves.description: Remain in right walking stance. Perform middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking stance block
moves.description: Bring the left foot in, then step out to face 9 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform high wedging block.

moves.title: Snap kick
moves.description: Remain in position. Perform right middle front snap kick.

moves.title: Walking stance punch
moves.description: Land forward into right walking stance. Perform middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking stance punch
moves.description: Remain in right walking stance. Perform middle reverse punch.

moves.title: Walking stance block
moves.description: Bring the right foot in, then step out to face 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high wedging block.

moves.title: Snap kick
moves.description: Remain in position. Perform left middle front snap kick.

moves.title: Walking stance punch
moves.description: Land forward into left walking stance. Perform middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking stance punch
moves.description: Remain in left walking stance. Perform middle reverse punch.

moves.title: Walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot left to face 6 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Walking stance block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Sitting stance strike
moves.description: Turn left 270 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step into sitting stance. Perform left knife-hand side strike.

moves.title: Sitting stance strike
moves.description: Step foot-to-foot to face 3 o'clock. Enter sitting stance. Perform right knife-hand side strike.

moves.title: Parallel Ready Stance
moves.description: Return to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.
